```{r}
setwd("~/stage_M2")
local_path <- "~/stage_M2/"
library(sf)
library(terra)
library(tidyverse)

goel_raster <- terra::rast("6.source/0_carte_cohabys/Goélands gris (argenté + leucophée)/MED_GREGUL_ETE_prediction_mean_NORM.grd")
plot(goel)

goel_sf <- as_tibble(goel) %>% 
  bind_cols(crds(goel)) %>%
  st_as_sf(dim = "XYZ", coords = c("x", "y"))
  
plot(goel_sf)
st_crs(goel_sf) <- crs(goel_raster)
```
